user_query: I'm curious to know what SimSimi has to say about the weather today. Send a request to SimSimi with the text 'What's the weather like today?' and the language code 'en'. Also, fetch the account information of my HeyWatch Video Encoding service to ensure the videos are encoded properly.

TaskList.description: Send a request to SimSimi with the query 'What's the weather like today?' in English.
Fetch the account information for the HeyWatch Video Encoding service to check video encoding status.
